summary: Adds a scripted player home/inn next to stony creek cave, with working planters, torture victims, a merchant, a bard and a follower.
descriptionHtml:
[b] Bad Dragon Inn [/b]

[b]Requires[/b] all dlcs, and General Displays http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32550/? and probably the latest version of skyrim

Works with unlimited bookshelves (except when you try to fill a bookshelf with 908420 notes, they tend to get stuck in there for an unknown reason, if you know how that could be resolved, and it wouldn't take that long, i guess I'll fix it and update the mod)

[b]Why:[/b]
Because you spend way more time sorting things than you should, and because dragon dildos.

[b]What it has:[/b]
[list] [*] Containers/Scripted: ingredients, recipes, staffs, soulgems, books, spelltomes, journals, notes, armor, clothes, robes, necklaces, rings, circlets, remains, ingots, ores, tools, bows, shields, onehanded, twohanded, healthpotions, magickapotions, staminapotions, food, drinks, firewood, gemstones. [/list] [list] [*] Containers/Named: Keys, For Sale, Potions, Enchanting supplies, Alchemy supplies, Smithing supplies, armor, weapons (smithing) [/list] [list] [*] Containers/Vanilla: added several other containers, for all those revealing armors, i guess. [/list] [list] [*] Weapon racks, weapon plaques, 6 mannequins, tons of actually working bookshelves [/list] [list] [*] Interactive Display points (put thing into treasures container, thing pops up somewhere else) for Hold shields, dragon priest masks, paragons, claws, daedric artifacts, ysgramor thingies, elder scrolls, divine amulets, thieves guild treasures, deathbrand treasure map, dragon thingy map, black books, those jars with insects, and some other stuff i forgot about [/list] [list] [*] Even has a smelter, tho since it's ugly no matter what, I hid it somewhere on the left of the house [/list] [list] [*] Pics of dragon dildos (you asked for it, not my fault) [/list] [list] [*] Torture room with displays for daedric artifacts, molag bal's altar, bloodbath and some other boring stuff. If you get stuck into the pit with human bones (cause, why the hell wouldn't you jump in there?), you can get out timing a jump perfectly while closing the door again, or using the console. [/list] [list] [*] Working hearthfire planters and mead brewer thingies [/list]

People:
Sam: Misc Merchant
Olivia: Depends, are you thirsty, hungry, both?
Malac: Sings horrible songs
Teddy: Werebear that keeps an eye on your victims while you're off adventuring. Everyone loves teddy, and so should you.
Killing him is not recommended.
Victims that deserve to be there

Also, navmesh. navmesh everywhere.

[b]Where it is:[/b]

There's a pic of the map with the exact location, it's to the southeast to Windhelm. You shouldn't have any problems finding it since I haven't added any quests to it this time, and I made the map marker visible from the start.

[b]How to install:[/b]
put all the things into the data folder
protip for just coc-ing in there (coc baddragoninn) just to check it out or anything: save it and load it up again

[b]How to uninstall:[/b]
I guess taking all your items you have placed in there would be a great idea before removing all the things from the data folder

[b] Known Issues[/b]
The hearthfire oven doesn't really make sense when used, but it looks good, so it stays like that

Without my permission, you can:
Use the mod for your mod (or, if you need certain things you can pm me about it and if I haven't deleted/forgot them by then, I'll probably help)
Upload my mod anywhere else
Send me chocolate
Improve my mod

And you can tell people that it's yours if you upload it to some japanese page since i probably won't ever find out and I really wouldn't care

[b]Credits [/b]
